revised_title: Ocean Thermal Energy Conversion: Techniques, Development, and Applications
scientific_discipline: Engineering and Technology > Energy and Power
tldr: This article discusses the technology of ocean thermal energy conversion (OTEC), which harnesses the temperature difference between warm surface water and cold deep water to generate electricity. The author provides an overview of the techniques, development status, and potential applications of OTEC, including its use in providing electricity and manufacturing energy-intensive products. The article also explores the environmental impacts, cost projections, and market penetration forecasts for OTEC.
